messages.title: Bernard campaigns for better bus services
messages.content: Bernard Harkins is pledging that Labour will bring in tougher regulation of bus services if Labour is elected to power.

messages.title: OAP FUEL ALLOWANCE CUT
messages.content: The Tory/Liberal coalition has cut the winter fuel allowance for pensioners. Those under 80 will see their payments cut by £50 while those over 80 will lose £100. Bernard says: 'George Osborne did not even have the guts to mention this cut in his Budget speech and tucked it away in the small print of the Budget red book. It’s a lamentable decision which will hit the poorest people hardest.'

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Bernard Harkins and the Labour Party are committed to implementing tougher regulations on bus services to ensure they serve the community effectively.
The Labour Party opposes the Tory/Liberal coalition's cut to the winter fuel allowance and pledges to protect pensioners from these cuts.

issues.socialWelfare: OAP Fuel Allowance cuts affecting the poorest the hardest.
